languages.text: "Некогда ты был{mf||а} комиссаром {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Имперской гвардии{/g}. Политическим офицером, не боявшимся смотреть в лицо смерти и отправлять на нее своих подчиненных. Решимость, вера, бескомпромиссность — все это дает тебе особую перспективу при взгляде на ситуации, где менее стойкий человек дрогнул бы духом. Поверь, в будущем у тебя будет достаточно ситуаций, когда стойкость в служении своему долгу — или интересам династии — окажется твоим козырем".

traits.locale_text: "Некогда ты был{mf||а} комиссаром {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Имперской гвардии{/g}. Политическим офицером, не боявшимся смотреть в лицо смерти и отправлять на нее своих подопытных. Решимость, вера, бескомпромиссность — все это дает тебе особую перспективу при взгляде на ситуации, где менее стойкий человек дрогнул бы духом. Поверь, в будущем у тебя будет достаточно ситуаций, когда стойкость в служении своему долгу — или интересам династии — окажется твоим козырем".

languages.text: "Once, you were a Commissar of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g}. A political officer who was not afraid to face {mf|his|her} own death or to send {mf|his|her} underlings to theirs. Resolve, faith, implacability — all of it gives one a unique perspective when presented with a situation where a less steadfast individual could falter. Trust me, your future holds plenty of situations where your commitment to your duty — or your house's interests — will be one of your strengths."
languages.original_text: "Некогда ты был{mf||а} комиссаром {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Имперской гвардии{/g}. Политическим офицером, не боявшимся смотреть в лицо смерти и отправлять на нее своих подчиненных. Решимость, вера, бескомпромиссность — все это дает тебе особую перспективу при взгляде на ситуации, где менее стойкий человек дрогнул бы духом. Поверь, в будущем у тебя будет достаточно ситуаций, когда стойкость в служении своему долгу — или интересам династии — окажется твоим козырем".

traits.locale_text: "Once, you were a Commissar of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g}. A political officer who was not afraid to gaze into the face of {mf|his|her} own death and send {mf|his|her} underlings to theirs. Resolve, faith, uncompromising attitude — all of it gives one a unique perspective when presented with a situation where a less steadfast individual could falter. Trust me, your future holds plenty of situations where your commitment to your duty — or your house's interests — will be one of your strengths."

"Once, you were a Commissar of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g}. A political officer who was not afraid to gaze into the face of {mf|his|her} own death and send {mf|his|her} underlings to theirs. Resolve, faith, uncompromising attitude — all of it gives one a unique perspective when presented with a situation where a less steadfast individual could falter. Trust me, your future holds plenty of situations where your commitment to your duty — or your house's interests — will be one of your strengths."

A political officer who was not afraid to face {mf|his|her} own death or to send {mf|his|her} underlings to theirs. Resolve, faith, implacability — all of it gives one a unique perspective when presented with a situation where a less steadfast individual could falter. Trust me, your future holds plenty of situations where your commitment to your duty — or your house's interests — will be one of your strengths."

"Once, you were a Commissar of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g}. A political officer who was not afraid to face {mf|his|her} own death or to send {mf|his|her} underlings to theirs. Resolve, faith, implacability — all of it gives one a unique perspective when presented with a situation where a less steadfast individual could falter. Trust me, your future holds plenty of situations where your commitment to your duty — or your house's interests — will be one of your strengths."

"Once, you were a Commissar of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g}. A political officer who was not afraid to face {mf|his|her} own death or to send {mf|his|her} underlings to theirs. Resolve, faith, implacability — all of it gives one a unique perspective when presented with a situation where a less steadfast individual could falter. Trust me, your future holds plenty of situations where your commitment to your duty — or your house's interests — will be one of your strengths."

languages.text: “你曾是{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}帝国卫队{/g}的政委。你既不惧怕面对自己的死亡，也不惧怕将你的下属派去送死。你充满决心、信念与坚韧，当你面对极端严峻的情况时，其他人可能会动摇，但你的品质会让你以新的角度看待问题。相信我，你接下来会面对很多困境。而在这些困境之中，你对帝国职责与家族利益的忠诚，将会成为你的优势。”
languages.original_text: "Once, you were a Commissar of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g}. A political officer who was not afraid to face {mf|his|her} own death or to send {mf|his|her} underlings to theirs. Resolve, faith, implacability — all of it gives one a unique perspective when presented with a situation where a less steadfast individual could falter. Trust me, your future holds plenty of situations where your commitment to your duty — or your house's interests — will be one of your strengths."

traits.locale_text: “你曾是{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}帝国卫队{/g}的政委。你既不惧怕面对自己的死亡，也不惧怕将你的下属派去送死。你充满决心、信念与坚韧，当你面对极端严峻的情况时，其他人可能会动摇，但你的品质会让你以新的角度看待问题。相信我，你接下来会面对很多困境。而在这些困境之中，你对帝国职责与家族利益的忠诚，将会成为你的优势。”

languages.text: «Fuiste Comisari{mf|o|a} de la {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Guardia Imperial{/g}. Un{mf||a} oficial polític{mf|o|a} que no temía su propia muerte ni enviar a tus seguidores a su muerte. Determinación, fe, un carácter implacable... todo esto te da una perspectiva singular al encontrarte con una situación donde alguien menos firme flaquearía. Hazme caso cuando te digo que en tu futuro te esperan numerosas situaciones donde tu dedicación al deber o a los intereses de tu casa serán uno de tus mayores ventajas».
languages.original_text: "Once, you were a Commissar of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g}. A political officer who was not afraid to face {mf|his|her} own death or to send {mf|his|her} underlings to theirs. Resolve, faith, implacability — all of it gives one a unique perspective when presented with a situation where a less steadfast individual could falter. Trust me, your future holds plenty of situations where your commitment to your duty — or your house's interests — will be one of your strengths."

traits.locale_text: «Fuiste Comisari{mf|o|a} de la {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Guardia Imperial{/g}. Un{mf||a} oficial polític{mf|o|a} que no temía su propia muerte ni enviar a tus seguidores a su muerte. Determinación, fe, un carácter implacable... todo esto te da una perspectiva singular al encontrarte con una situación donde alguien menos firme flaquearía. Hazme caso cuando te digo que en tu futuro te esperan numerosas situaciones donde tu dedicación al deber o a los intereses de tu casa serán uno de tus mayores ventajas».

languages.text: 「かつて、あなたは{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}帝国防衛軍{/g}のコミッサーだった。死に直面することも、部下を死に向かわせることも恐れなかった政治将校。決意、信念、執拗さ…そのすべてが、自信のない者がためらうような状況に直面した時にも、独自の視点をもたらす。きっと将来は必ず、その義務や家の利益に対する献身があなたの強みになる場面がたくさん訪れることでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Once, you were a Commissar of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g}. A political officer who was not afraid to face {mf|his|her} own death or to send {mf|his|her} underlings to theirs. Resolve, faith, implacability — all of it gives one a unique perspective when presented with a situation where a less steadfast individual could falter. Trust me, your future holds plenty of situations where your commitment to your duty — or your house's interests — will be one of your strengths."

traits.locale_text: 「かつて、あなたは{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}帝国防衛軍{/g}のコミッサーでした。{mf|彼|彼女}自身の死に直面することも、{mf|彼|彼女}の部下を送ることも恐れなかった政治将校でした。決意、信念、執拗さ…そのすべてが、自分に自信のない者がためらうような状況に直面した時に、独自の視点をもたらします。信じてください、あなたの将来には、自分の義務または家の利益へのコミットメントがあなたの強みの1つとなる状況がたくさん訪れるでしょう」
「かつて、あなたは{g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}帝国防衛軍{/g}のコミッサーだった。死に直面することも、部下を死に向かわせることも恐れなかった政治将校。決意、信念、執拗さ…そのすべてが、自信のない者がためらうような状況に直面した時にも、独自の視点をもたらす。きっと将来は必ず、その義務や家の利益に対する献身があなたの強みになる場面がたくさん訪れることでしょう」

languages.text: « Autrefois, vous étiez commissaire de la {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Garde Impériale{/g}, un officier politique qui n'avait pas peur d'affronter sa propre mort ou d'envoyer ses subordonnés vers la leur. La détermination, la foi, l'inflexibilité : autant de qualités qui offrent une perspective unique lorsque l'on fait face à une situation dans laquelle une personne moins résolue pourrait vaciller. Croyez-moi, l'avenir vous réserve une multitude de situations dans lesquelles votre engagement envers votre mission, ou les intérêts de votre maison, sera un atout. »
languages.original_text: "Once, you were a Commissar of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g}. A political officer who was not afraid to face {mf|his|her} own death or to send {mf|his|her} underlings to theirs. Resolve, faith, implacability — all of it gives one a unique perspective when presented with a situation where a less steadfast individual could falter. Trust me, your future holds plenty of situations where your commitment to your duty — or your house's interests — will be one of your strengths."

traits.locale_text: « Autrefois, vous étiez commissaire de la {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Garde Impériale{/g}, un officier politique qui n'avait pas peur d'affronter sa propre mort ou d'envoyer ses subordonnés vers la leur. La détermination, la foi, l'inflexibilité : autant de qualités qui offrent une perspective unique lorsque l'on fait face à une situation dans laquelle une personne moins résolue pourrait vaciller. Croyez-moi, l'avenir vous réserve une multitude de situations dans lesquelles votre engagement envers votre mission, ou les intérêts de votre maison, sera un atout. »

languages.text: "Ihr wart {mf|ein Kommissar|eine Kommissarin} der {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}imperialen Armee{/g}. {mf|Ein politischer Offizier, der|Eine politische Offizierin, die} den eigenen Tod nicht scheute und {mf|seine|ihre} Untergebenen ohne Zögern in den ihren schickte. Entschlossenheit, Glaube, Unerbittlichkeit – das alles führt zu einer einzigartigen Sichtweise in Situationen, die weniger gefestigte Individuen scheitern lassen würden. Vertraut mir, Eure Zukunft hält vieles bereit, bei dem Euer Pflichtbewusstsein – oder die Interessen Eures Hauses – sich als Stärke erweisen werden."
languages.original_text: "Once, you were a Commissar of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g}. A political officer who was not afraid to face {mf|his|her} own death or to send {mf|his|her} underlings to theirs. Resolve, faith, implacability — all of it gives one a unique perspective when presented with a situation where a less steadfast individual could falter. Trust me, your future holds plenty of situations where your commitment to your duty — or your house's interests — will be one of your strengths."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wart {mf|ein Kommissar|eine Kommissarin} der {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}imperialen Armee{/g}. {mf|Ein politischer Offizier, der|Eine politische Offizierin, die} den eigenen Tod nicht scheute und {mf|seine|ihre} Untergebenen ohne Zögern in den ihren schickte. Entschlossenheit, Glaube, Unerbittlichkeit – das alles führt zu einer einzigartigen Sichtweise in Situationen, die weniger gefestigte Individuen scheitern lassen würden. Vertraut mir, Eure Zukunft hält vieles bereit, bei dem Euer Pflichtbewusstsein – oder die Interessen Eures Hauses – sich als Stärke erweisen werden."

languages.text: "Eskiden {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}İmparatorluk Muhafızları'na{/g} mensup bir Komiser'din. Ne ölmekten ne de astlarını ölüme yollamaktan korkan bir siyasi subaydın. Kararlılık, inanç, amansızlık... Tüm bunlar kişiye, iradesi daha zayıf birinin bocalayacağı bir durumda eşsiz bir bakış açısı sunar. Güven bana, geleceğin vazifene veya mensup olduğun hanenin çıkarlarına olan bağlılığının güçlü yanlarından biri olacağı pek çok duruma gebe."
languages.original_text: "Once, you were a Commissar of the {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}Imperial Guard{/g}. A political officer who was not afraid to face {mf|his|her} own death or to send {mf|his|her} underlings to theirs. Resolve, faith, implacability — all of it gives one a unique perspective when presented with a situation where a less steadfast individual could falter. Trust me, your future holds plenty of situations where your commitment to your duty — or your house's interests — will be one of your strengths."

traits.locale_text: "Eskiden {g|Encyclopedia:AstraMilitarum}İmparatorluk Muhafızları{/g}na mensup bir Komiser'din. Ne ölmekten ne de astlarını ölüme yollamaktan korkan bir siyasi subaydın. Kararlılık, inanç, amansızlık... Tüm bunlar kişiye, iradesi daha zayıf birinin bocalayacağı bir durumda eşsiz bir bakış açısı sunar. Güven bana, geleceğin vazifene veya mensup olduğun hanenin çıkarlarına olan bağlılığının güçlü yanlarından biri olacağı pek çok duruma gebe."

Resolve, faith, implacability — all of it gives one a unique perspective when presented with a situation where a less steadfast individual could falter. Trust me, your future holds plenty of situations where your commitment to your duty — or your house's interests — will be one of your strengths."
